segments.text: Excuse me , what's the actual flying time from here to Zurich ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you tell me when we are arriving ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see ... at 6:15 am local time tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And that will be 10:15 pm Tokyo time .
segments.speaker: S2
